# sarw_spheres

Python wrapper on C++ self avoiding random walk (SARW) generator.

# Installation

```bash
python3 -m pip install sarw_spheres
```

# Usage

```Python
import numpy as np
import sarw_spheres
sarw_spheres.generateChain(np.array([1.,1.,1.,1.]))
```
